name: Fluffy
description: Fluffy is a playful and lovely pet. She loves kids but can be a little shy around strangers.
medicalHistory: Got last booster shot on the 23rd of November 2022.

name: Oscar
description: Oscar has a bit of a temperament, I call him the kitty with an attitude. As soon as he gets used to you though he's very loving and territorial. He doesn't like other pets taking the attention.
medicalHistory: Due for a booster in 3 weeks.

name: Leo
description: Leo is very calm and peaceful and is good with other pets. Loves getting his tummy rubbed and can be very energetic when his in the mood for it.
medicalHistory: Just Got a booster on the 7th of October 2022.

name: Polly
description: I've had Polly since she was a baby. She loves raspberries, is very smart and loves attention. She's Excellent for famillies with small children and other pets.

name: Dodo
description: Dodo loves bananas, a very lovely and caring little fella. Unfortunately I have to rehome him as he requires a lot of attention and I don't have the ability to give him that right now. I just welcomed a new baby and my full attention is on the baby.

name: Stitch
description: Stitch is shy but playful once he gets used to you. He is very affectionate and very loving. He requires reqular brushing and teeth cleaned daily. I just realised I'm allergic to dogs so I have to give this cutie up.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a calm, smart and very agile baby. I just found out I will be travelling a lot for work so I can't keep him.

name: Marshmallow
description: I got Marshmallow when I travelled to Holland last year. He is very friendly and loves kids. Great for families with kids, very easy going and very smart. The problem is my husky is not very fund of him, so I want to rehome him to a safer environment.
medicalHistory: Got his annual shot on the 15th of April 2022.

name: Strawberry
description: Strawberry is very shy around strangers but very affectionate once she gets used to you.
medicalHistory: Vaccinated with Tetanus, Flu and EHV vaccine.

name: Cookie
description: Cookie loves interacting with new people, very curious and clever. He's also low maintenance. Unfortunately, I have a lot of personal stuff on my plate so I can't take care of him right now.
medicalHistory: Does not require vaccination. Rather annual check-ups.
